data.description: Innovative marketplace dedicated to the sale of nightlife tickets. Nyxell combines speed, security, and simplicity to offer an exceptional shopping experience. Focused on personalized customer service, it provides comprehensive support from purchase to access through our brand ambassadors.

Dynamic technology company, part of the Barrabés Group, a leader in e-commerce and innovation consulting, and the BTS Group, an international telecommunications operator. In full expansion both nationally and internationally, Trackglobe combines Barrabés' e-commerce experience with BTS' telecommunications strength, positioning itself as a reference in the technology sector.

Prestigious technology consulting firm, with a specialized focus on digital transformation and innovative technological solutions. Founded in 1986 in Aragon, Integra has evolved from its roots in training and computer science to become a leader in the national technology sector. Its trajectory is marked by the development of cross-cutting projects, the attainment of the highest technical certifications, and the formation of strategic alliances that underline its commitment to continuous innovation.

Part of the renowned supermarket chain of the El Corte Inglés group, HiperCor stands out for its wide range of high-quality products in food, fashion, electronics, and home. In my role as an intern, I gained key experience in hardware maintenance and repair. This stage provided me with fundamental skills in problem-solving and essential technical support for my professional development.

data.title: Higher Degree in Multiplatform Application Development
data.description: Educational program focused on training experts in software creation for various platforms, combining programming, interface design, and database management with practical experience.

data.title: Intermediate Degree in Microcomputer Systems and Networks
data.description: Training program focused on the installation, maintenance, and management of computer equipment and networks, ideal for starting a technical career in the IT and telecommunications sector.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description1: From Andalusian roots, I was born in Jerez and raised in Seville, places I visit less often than I would like. Despite not being fond of the cold, I live in Zaragoza, although it's not uncommon to find me in Valencia, where my partner lives. On my travels, my faithful companion, my laptop, is always with me.
aboutMe.description2: An enthusiast of music and audiovisual content editing, an area that helps me combine my creativity and technical skills. I define myself as an extroverted person, always ready to meet new people and explore places to discover.
aboutMe.description3: From an early age, I have been fascinated by any device with a screen, a curiosity that eventually turned into my vocation and, later, my professional career. Today, I have the privilege of dedicating myself to what I am most passionate about: creating and bringing my code to life, merging technology and creativity.
